Reviews.Title: Great... But not perfect
Reviews.Author: Beagle
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with this camera, and I highly recommend it. My only complant is its battery life which is good, but just not as good as the rest of the camera. It takes super great pictures, and has many useful features and shooting modes. Like panorama, Magic, and beauty. I love having the 7X optical zoom, along with the 5X digital. You can use the digital zoom even while shooting video. It has this cool feature that I really like called Sequential shooting, which can take many many picture very fast. Of course it reduces the quality of the photo, but not to an unbearable level, and if you don't zoom in unnoticeable.Pros-*Picture quality*Ease of use*Features*Zoom*SpeedCons-*Perfect camera, just not enough battery lifeI love this camera and encourage you to buy it. The battery wont trouble you unless you are going on a trip like I was and you take over 400 pictures a day.

Reviews.Title: A Fantastic Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Lit Lover
Reviews.Content: I bought my Olympus a few days before a big trip to France.  I hoped it wasn't a dud, but I had looked around at local stores and online reviews and it kept standing out to me.  I was concerned at first about having no physical "how to" manual, but it hasn't been a problem.  I played with all the features on my trip, and I have to say my photos have been stunning - clear, amazing colors, great range of view.  The panorama feature especially has been a treat - easy to use and it creates such unique perspectives.  The macro feature also gave my close-up shots crisp definition with great depth.  I can't count the number of times I've said "I love this camera!"  The only piece I'm not crazy about is that it's a rechargeable battery, so I have to think ahead and make sure it's charged before taking it somewhere; not great for spontaneous needs, but I'll deal with it.  The best part of all of this is, I would have paid so more for it - the price can't be beat.  I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a feature-rich point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: olympus stylus7030
Reviews.Author: Lois Flynn
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd Olympus Stylus camera I have bought.  I wanted a more compact camera for travel. I love this one, very easy to use.  Loads of different features. The photo's very clear and sharp.  Great zoom.  I just wish the battery had a longer life.  I bought an extra battery so always have a spare fully charged battery backup.I reccomend it and would buy again.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE of Olympus Service
Reviews.Author: Fair Minded Guy
Reviews.Content: I own the 7010 version of this camera - identical except it is 12MP rather than 14MP. For a point-and-shoot camera, the product attributes and picture quality are excellent (far exceeding the performance of both a Nikon Coolpix and a Canon Powershot owned by other members of my family).So why only 2 stars? Unfortunately it seems we can no longer trust Olympus customer service. The repair center in Hauppage New York failed to acknowledge a legitimate warranty claim for a lens-cover malfunction and subsequent lens damage to my camera. If customer service is a consideration in your purchase, I recommend you choose a different brand.Update - November 2012As a spare/occasional camera, I'm still using the (expensively repaired) 7010 and continue to achieve quite acceptable, good-resolution results with it. A couple of points to note for those who may still be in the market for one. 1) Do not risk getting this camera wet. Do not take it out in the rain. Do not take it out in high humidity. Do not take it out in fog. Do not even put it in the vicinity of water droplets. Don't say you weren't warned! 2)The auto-white-balance mode has always tended to create pictures which are kinda washed-out (in any lighting conditions) and require quite a bit of post-processing to look their best. The long and short of it is that it was a competitive camera with an excellent zoom lens for its day. It is capable of taking great pictures using the non-auto-WB modes and in dry conditions, but for another 20-30 dollars, you can get much better Sony and Lumix (maybe even Olympus?) point-and-shoots nowadays.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: HMoni
Reviews.Content: I received my purchased item about 4 days after I ordered it. Takes amazing photos and allows for panoramic views. Very clear. The only downside is that in trying to perfectly focus your shot, there is lag time with actually capturing the shot.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: jhsutton
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera for a little of everything.  I am truly an SLR user but I do love to carry a good point and shoot for fun.  I have found this camera to be a little better than most.  It is easy to operate and takes very clear pictures.  The macro works wonderful, this is the first camera I have had that macro is good. I have found that I carry this more than I thought I would and the quality is right up there with my SLR.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've owned several Olympus Stylus cameras...mainly because I'm comfortable with their features so it's easy to learn a new camera.  This particular camera has a different set up and I've had a hard time adjusting.  Not the camera's fault, I'm sure this is a User problem!If you buy this product plan to spend some time playing around with it.  And become intimate with "Reset" so when you goof up the settings you can return it to factory specs.Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use camera for a novice
Reviews.Author: npetrin
Reviews.Content: Overall, a good camera.  I did not read the instructions and can easily use 90% of the features.  There are a few things I will have to go back and read to figure out but overall a nice camera for the value.Pros: Easy to navigate  Easy to use  Great pictureCons: None, really

Reviews.Title: beyond hopes
Reviews.Author: searcher001
Reviews.Content: being a novice in the digital world,i was overwelmed at first,after instruction download and playing w/menu,it was very easy to follow.love the camera and expect more and more from it as  i learn more "tricks" of the trade,so to speak.AMAZON delivered in exceptional time,and memory card followed within day which was perfect.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Granville I. Stark
Reviews.Content: A lot of great features in a compact package. It is easy to drop in your pocket. I like the telephoto and the settings for various lighting conditions.

Reviews.Title: GREAT VALUE
Reviews.Author: Rita K. Lowry
Reviews.Content: I TOOK IT ON VACATION AND WAS VERY HAPPY WITH IT.  GREAT PICTURES, EASY TO USE AND A GREAT VALUE FOR THE MONEY.  IT DOES NOT COME WITH MEMORY CARD SO JUST MAKE SURE YOU ORDER ONE.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera
Reviews.Author: grma-neats
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this camera. It arrived when promised and new in the box. I do like the on screen instructions so I do not have to look everything up in a book. I did download the manual to my computer to review all the features but it is easy to operate everything on the camera. The battery seems to last quite a long time also.I would definately recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Stylus Camera
Reviews.Author: halfcrocked
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with how easy this camera is to use.  HOWEVER, if you don't use a TRI-POD you will be disappointed with the quality of your photos when you enlarge them.  That "little shake" ends up making it quite blurry.  So using it at it's optimum MP's and then ZOOMING in for the shot.  SET it for TIMED shutter.  Then it is clear as can be!I am very happy with the various settings for "quirky' shots, as well.  FUN camera to play with. FAR from professional.

Reviews.Title: small things come in amazing packages
Reviews.Author: kcuric
Reviews.Content: Always been a Nikon fan, but this camera made me believe in Olympus. Amazing filters that I have not seen in any other camera; such as the fish eye and drawing.. Also a small camera such as this carries a deadly punch with it's 7X optical zoom. The down size it's a bit harder to use then some of it's counter parts, but a small price to pay for such a great package.

Reviews.Title: Good... but it falls apart
Reviews.Author: E. A. Fite
Reviews.Content: Got the camera for my husband last Christmas. On the third use the lens git stuck as it was turning on so it couldn't extend and was sitting partially open, and crooked. I wiggle and fanagled it open, seemed fine for about two months of very light usage. Then it happened again. I got it opened again but was doubting the durabilty of this happening and staying in one piece. Next time we used it, the lens ring - that has no affect on pictures but protects the camers - fell off! You'd thing we use this camera all the time or jostle it around too much. NO! It sits on my husband's desk for use of eBay picture taking. Hopefully ours is a fluke but I would bet $100 on it.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with camara!
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: I love olympus stylus camaras, they take beautiful pictures and are so easy to use. I got this camera to replace the a 8px one that was stolen from me, and am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: JLL
Reviews.Content: I purchased this same camera a few years ago and ours fell overboard on a kayak trip.  I bought again because it was an easy camera to operate and I wouldn't have another learning curve to conquer.

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: L. Sauter "rvingmama"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Olympus digital camera and I really like it except the reaction is slow when taking a picture.  Also takes panoramic very well and video clips.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Stylus 7030 Awesome
Reviews.Author: elviscreole
Reviews.Content: When I received my Olympus Stylus 7030 14 MP digital camera from Amazon I was pleasantly surprised to see how easy it was to charge the battery through my computer.  So far I haven't had to check out the instruction manual that is uploaded on my computer, because it is so easy to use. I couldn't wait to get a card so I could start taking pictures! I'm loving this camera! With Christmas coming, I will have lots of fun taking pictures!Marilynn

Reviews.Title: Crummy
Reviews.Author: Nancy Yturriaga Adams
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my Olympus FE 130(damaged--and not repairable) which was a really great camera.  I used it to photo my ceramic art and it was so good that I had thought to upgrade---big mistake!  This new camera was a big pain in the butt---and it distored the closeup pix and the lighting as well---I longed for my old camera, but to no avail, but it seems that Olympus would rather produce this monster camera instead of the old one which was a perfect camera in every way---the new one---blank screen---lines in view port----menu that never hides---distorted lighting---yuk!  Don't buy it!

Reviews.Title: Everyday camera
Reviews.Author: Chardon Retired
Reviews.Content: The entire purchase process was seamless and easy.  The camera delivered quickly and was exactly as advertized at a great price!  Having said that...the instructions for set up and operation of the camera provided by Olympus were almost useless.  There are camera features listed in the ad that are not even printed on the instruction detail.  What's up with that Olympus?  Recommend the 16 MB memory card be purchased with the camera for large picture and video storage.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Southern Shopper
Reviews.Content: I have been impressed with Olympus cameras for several years and this one is no exception.  It can do more than we will ever use it for but still takes nice photos even when just left on the auto settings.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this camera to take on vacation. It replaces an older model that I dropped in the harbor. I was happy with that camera and feel the same about this unit. It is simple to operate and takes good pictures. That's all I can ask from a camera in this price range.

Reviews.Title: sues review
Reviews.Author: susiesreviews
Reviews.Content: Great camera at a unbelievable price!  Love the in-camera instruction book.  I rated the battery well but really have not had it that long to know for sure but so far am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: olympus 7030
Reviews.Author: fredbob1
Reviews.Content: Love it. Easy to use, small, great pictures, reasonably priced and shock proof and water proof.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Point and Shoot for the Price
Reviews.Author: gsTech
Reviews.Content: For the price this camera has it all. Easy to use and good quality pictures. Low Light Conditions may be a concern but then you can't get a DSLR picture quality for less than 100$.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Stylus 7030 - Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel P. Lacey
Reviews.Content: I love the Olympus Stylus line. Picked this one on Amazon because list is $199 and purchased for $139!!! At that price you cannot get the features and picture quality.The Stylus line has incredible picture quality and ease of use. Add the 7X optical zoom and other features (panorama, video @ 720p, etc.) and you have a serious pocket camera.

Reviews.Title: to hard to set
Reviews.Author: Linda Mize
Reviews.Content: awful never could use it all pics came out too white and bright.  waste of money. do not buy it

Reviews.Title: Didn't last 6 months
Reviews.Author: Fuzzmom
Reviews.Content: It took decent photos while it lasted, but it didn't last 6 months.  I would not recommend the product. You can probably good a  refurbished camera with a higher zoom for same price range, and come out better in the end.

Reviews.Title: Good at first
Reviews.Author: RTX
Reviews.Content: The camera worked great, for a little while.  the cover for the USB broke off shortly after I purchased it, which was a cheap rubber flap with some sort of molded plastic cover.  Now, about 8 months later, the display has stopped working.  The camera took decent pictures, but has not lasted nearly as long as my old canon elph.

Reviews.Title: Olympus digital camera
Reviews.Author: ltbailey
Reviews.Content: This is a super, durable small digital camera.  It has a clear picture quality, lots of useful features and is easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: pj6532
Reviews.Content: Great size easy to use a real bargain fits into the small purses easily and is very ligjt weight operates great

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Sammi
Reviews.Content: I really like the digital camera. It is very easy to use and takes really good pictures. I haven't had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: C T Wilson
Reviews.Content: This is the second one that I have purchased. The first one still works great just wanted the upgrade better lens. Very user frendly and a better charger system. Batteries are interchangeable.

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: ajain24
Reviews.Content: though i have not yet used it much it looks good for the price; it is sleek, faster imgage processing good colors

Reviews.Title: Love Olympus but...
Reviews.Author: RockbottomMama
Reviews.Content: I really do love Olympus cameras.  This is my 4th.  The last one took a lot of punishment (read: toddler got her hands on it quite often!) before it gave up the fight.  I love the great pictures this camera takes but I there are a few things I don't like...1.  It has a LOOOOONG delay.  I'm not used to this from previous Olympus cameras.  :(  something to get used to...2.  It's a bit odd in it's automatic settings.  Every once in a while I get completely whited out pics when the 4 before it (in the same conditions) were fine.3.  I don't love the software for cataloging that came with it.  I prefer to sort my photos via PS Elements.With those things said, I'm still pleased with it.  Just having some growing pains.  And to be honest, I kinda wish I could get my old camera again....

Reviews.Title: Cheap in price, and you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: S. Lennox
Reviews.Content: This camera takes good out pictures out side in day light, but once you start with a flash indoors, or even at night, the quality of the picture goes down hill.  I was  very happy at first, but when I took it to my daughters college graduation and the pictures came out horrible I quickly changed my mind.  Some of the pictures came  out very yellow, some came out ok, some did not come out at all.  The lag between the time of the actual snap, she wasn't in the shot anymore, someone else's child was walking down that isle.  I had the camera set on auto so I would not have to play with the settings and there was no reason for this to happen.  I have also found that when I use the zoom, my pictures come out blurry, no matter what I do.  I am lucky if I get 1 good picture out of 10 that I take with the zoom.  It has a lot of noise in the flash pictures.  If I paid full price for this camera, I would have returned it in a heart beat!  I got it to replace a Cannon..  I miss my Cannon.  I would not recommend this camera unless you are giving it to a teen or someone who doesn't want keep sake memories..  because with this camera, you can not tell if you will get that shot or not.  Oh, and another thing,  there are times that the lens freezes up and will not retract to shut or open all the way.  I have to take out the battery and wait a minute, then put it back in to get it to work.  I have the extended warranty on the camera but I have not sent it back yet.

Reviews.Title: Calidad Precio
Reviews.Author: JUlio Perez
Reviews.Content: Las caracteristicas tecnica de esta camara son excelente para el costo del producto tienes una calidad de imagen muy buena si comparamos con otras marcas con caracteristicas similares la pyumpus 7030 es mejor, con relaion a su precio es una opcion muy buena, facil de usar, lo unico es que se debe comprar una bateria adicional por que no dura mucho aprox. 150 fotos. Recominedo la compra de este producto.

Reviews.Title: Fine cameras
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: The performance is perfect as the handle, the control allow the exact setting for yours situations, it's versatil and easy to set, compact and ligth.

Reviews.Title: sending it back
Reviews.Author: The Walkers "Mother of 3"
Reviews.Content: This camera is going back tomorrow! I am soooooo disappointed in Olympus for this design.The pro's:* the size* the features such as image stabilization and 14.1mp* the battery life was no a problem for us. It lasted a week with constant shooting.The con's* The flash is right under the shutter button. Every photo my finger kept covering up the flash. So annoying and when I let my husband try to take a photo he did the same thing. You just naturally hold it in place with your finger right over the flash due to the shutter button being there.* I hate the rechargeable battery being the ONLY option. Why not both (rechargeable and non) or let the customer choose a model to their needs.* The zoom is crazy fast. I spent more time having to un-zoom than getting the photo shot* I do not like that you can't just turn on the screen to edit or delete photos without turning the whole camera on including the lens retracting.* All my photos on "auto" shot came out really red... to the point that we quit using the auto shot mode. Not very fun having to redo the settings every shot* Does not accept XD cards.* the computer software was totally unwanted by me but the auto installed it onto my computer which I hate. I have the best photo editing software on the market which I paid a high price for and have no needs or wants to another cheap version being shoved onto my computer* to top the software issue off... the software wouldn't work and I could not get my photos of the camera. You have to use the camera's software to download photos off the camera's memory. If you use a memory card you do not have to worry about this.* shutter speed is not like the older Olympus models. It is much much slower.

Reviews.Title: Loved my 740-disliked my 7030!
Reviews.Author: Roxanne Sitarz "hyena owner"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because I thought I would enjoy the new features, since I was replacing my Stylus 740.My problems are as follows:1.) You cannot view your images without the lens being extended and open! The 740 will allow you to chose the "view" option and then turn on the camera, saving battery and also protecting the lens.2.) All the pictures I took had poor quality. I only took decent macro shots-the rest where sub-par.3.) It is extremely annoying to have to scan thru the menu "P" to make personal changes to the settings. If I want to change the WB or ISO, I shouldn't have to press the down button thru a scroll list!4.) I felt the shutter delay was completely unacceptable, especially for an Olympus.I returned this camera after only 2 days.Oh-0and it doesn;t accept XD cards!!!!!rtr

Reviews.Title: Beyond Fragile
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera's features and picture quality, but unfortunately this is the most fragile camera on the market.  This camera fell 3 feet off of a table onto a carpet and the lens jammed.  I thought that it might have been just stuck, but nope, it's done.  I've learned my lesson for buying a camera other than Nikon or Cannon. Never Again. This product is now in my trash.

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel resolution for high-quality, poster-size prints
7x wide-angle dual image stabilized zoom
Shadow Adjustment Technology; AF tracking
Creative Art Filters
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus Stylus 7030 14 MP Digital Camera with 7x Wide Angle Dual Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Titanium)
